title: Lux' ult is getting a little ridiculous...
body: It's Down to 15 seconds~ by the end of the game now... if it's going to have the cooldown of a regular ability, how about we give it the damage of a regular ability.  That way she has to land her full combo as it should be.

replies.body: Not enough, I need to use it 3 times in one fight. I say reduce cooldown to 20/15/10. Keep the cooldown reduction thing as well. Also, up the ratio, she really needs it. Poor thing.
